# automatic

**Type Property**

The scaling behavior that is standard for the window’s style.

## Declaration

```swift
static var automatic: WorldScalingBehavior { get }
```

## Discussion

By default, regular [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/WindowGroup] windows have dynamic scaling, while windows with a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/WindowStyle/volumetric] window style use fixed scaling.
title: automatic
